lexUnit.name: astound.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: overwhelm with surprise and wonder

sentence.text: The pair , Steven Shaw and Michael Edwards , astounded the parapsychological community with their abilities to bend metal , move objects across a table , link wooden rings , read sealed envelopes , and so on .
This banal observation astounded her , though she did not know why .
Her bluntness astounded him .
The result astounded him .
That there should be such a variety of species of one kind of creature astounded him .
His reply astounded me , and will ring in my ears for eternity .
At times , Chris , your innocence astounds me . "
Ann astounded a Sunday-school teacher , who was telling the children about leprosy , by saying , ` My father is a leper . "
Miss Honey was astounded by the wisdom of this tiny girl .
I never ceased to be astounded by how quickly and thoroughly he absorbed the notes I gave him . "
The humans were astounded by the grace and majesty of Elf civilisation and well-pleased with the commerce that went on there .
Her friend , Jean , was still astounded by the black legs of lamb .
He had been as openly astounded and as privately elated by Collingridge 's bombshell as the rest of his colleagues .
I saw the name on the bag and asked his age and I was astounded .
He settled in London and astounded the country by the extent to which he was able to overcome his disastrous physical handicaps .
Amaldi astounded his group in October 1934 with his discovery that by slowing down , rather than accelerating , neutrons , he could provoke intense nuclear reactions .
He astounded his American masters by demanding that they give him a more worthwhile job or he would be on his way home .
We 'll cosset you in sumptuous comfort , astound you with service from a bygone era , tempt you with the quality of our cuisine and delight you with our shipboard facilities and entertainment .
The idea is , I 'll present it you and you you can I wo n't try and astound you with it because it is hard to do that under these contexts .
The team continued to astound with their attacking flair and sound defence , treating the home crowd to wins of 5-1 over Plymouth , 10-1 over Croydon Common and 7-1 over New Brompton .
